title: How Prime Bicycles went from DH racing dreams to launching two gravity bikes
content:
Last winter we got a tease of upstart mountain bike company Prime Bicycles with their long-running DH bike project. Now, Prime is ready to hit the trails with two new 29er mountain bikes, the Rocket DH bike we’d glimpsed before and an all-new Thunderflash enduro bike. Building off more than 15 years of UCI gravity […]

The post How Prime Bicycles went from DH racing dreams to launching two gravity bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
